algorithms.compression_algorithms

Class FixedBitSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.BitSet
      • algorithms.compression_algorithms.FixedBitSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FixedBitSet
extends java.util.BitSet
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the original BitSet fixed - wrapped with a size field. the problem I had with BitSet is that it saves the logical size of the set, means for example for the binary string: 0011 the size will be 2. here I added the actual size of the set.
    Author:
    Tomer Cabouly
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
